themes: meaningful inclusion of BIPOC community in decision-making
co-development of policies with affected groups
key_phrases: meaningfully including the BIPOC community in decision-making processes that directly impact them
ensuring that policies and initiatives are co-developed with those who are most affected
barriers_identified: lack of meaningful inclusion of BIPOC community in decision-making
policies not co-developed with affected communities
solutions_proposed: meaningful inclusion of BIPOC community in decision-making
co-developing policies and initiatives with those most affected
